description_for_human: Verifiable AI skill safety classification with zero-knowledge ML proofs
description_for_model: Classify AI agent skills as SAFE/CAUTION/DANGEROUS with mandatory cryptographic zkML proof. To classify by name: POST /api/v1/evaluate with {"skill": "slug-name"}. To classify with full data: POST /api/v1/evaluate with {"skill": {"name": "...", "version": "1.0.0", "author": "...", "skill_md": "...", "scripts": [], "files": []}}. Costs $0.001 USDC via x402 on Base. Verify proofs free: POST /api/v1/verify with {"proof_b64": "...", "program_io": {...}}. Every response includes a SNARK proof certifying the classification was computed correctly. LLM-readable docs at /.well-known/llms.txt.
